price: Kuma idan sun haɗu da waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni, sukan ce: "Mun yi ĩmãni. "Kuma idan sun wõfinta zuwa ga shaiɗãnunsu,* sukan ce: "Lalle ne muna tãre da ku: Mu mãsu izgili, kawai ne."
arabic: وَإِذَا لَقُواْ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ قَالُوٓاْ ءَامَنَّا وَإِذَا خَلَوۡاْ إِلَىٰ شَيَٰطِينِهِمۡ قَالُوٓاْ إِنَّا مَعَكُمۡ إِنَّمَا نَحۡنُ مُسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ
footnotes: * Kashi na hudu su ne Yahudãwa waɗanda suke sun san gaskiyar Annabcin Muhammadu da Manzancinsa, amma hãsada ta hana su su bi shi, sunã ƙõƙãrin ɓãta abin da ya zo da shi ta hanyar jħfa shibhõhi a ciki, dõmin su kange mutãne daga shigarsa. Sabõda haka aka ce musu shaiɗãnu. Duk wanda ya san gaskiya amma kuma ya yi girman kai daga binta, to, shi ne shaiɗan, daga aljannu kõ daga mutane.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
